{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TRENDnet |model=TEW-812DRU |revision=V1.0R |series=AC1750 |upc=710931130003 |asin=B00B0CQCCC |est_release_date=01/10/2013 |fcc_date=12/17/2012 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=U-MEDIA |manuf_model=WRT-C80B |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=XU8TEW1750AC |pcb_id=0500-2531801000 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4706 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68B16CWQD-25H |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0,Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=U-MEDIA WMD-700B |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4331 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53125 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |addl_chips=2.4/5GHz Wireless LAN FEM;Skyworks (SiGe);SE2594L;;3; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks (SiGe);SE5003L1;;3; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TRENDnet812XXXX,TRENDnet812acXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TRENDnet812[0-9]{4}$,,,^TRENDnet812ac[0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=D8:EB:97 |oui_eth=D8:EB:97 }} {{TagLine|AC1750 Dual Band Wireless Router}} :[http://www.trendnet.com/products/proddetail.asp?prod=100_TEW-812DRU&cat=197 Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://www.trendnet.com/downloads/list_subcategory.asp?SUBTYPE_ID=1610 Downloads]
===FCC info=== The FCC docs specify that this FCC ID is also used for the [[TRENDnet TEW-800MB|TEW-800MB]] :(''AC1750 Dual Band Wireless Media Bridge''). The TEW-800MB is also specified as an additional model in the FCC filing :for the [[TRENDnet TEW-811DRU|TEW-811DRU]] as the ''AC1200 Dual Band Wireless Media Bridge''.
Per the FCC photos... *"WRT-C80B" and "Rev. UB" appears to be silkscreened on the main board. *BCM4360 is the 5GHz Wi-Fi IC. :It is using three [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=1504 SE5003L1 / 5003L1 power amplfiier ICs] *The Mini PCIe wireless module (2.4GHz radio) is using BCM4331 :(and would appear to be dual-band capable). *It is using three SE2594L Dual Band 802.11a/b/g/n Wireless LAN FEMs.
The default SSID pattern for the 2.4GHz band may be '''TRENDnet812XXXX''' :(where '''XXXX''' appears to be a random 4-digit number).
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32139-trendnet-tew-812dru-ac1750-dual-band-wireless-router-reviewed Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :"0500-2531801000" and "Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on the main board. :A sticker with "081R-WRTC80BN00 R05" (probably) and some other :stuff is affixed to the LAN port casing, D8:EB:97 OUI. :Default SSID formats of '''TRENDnet812XXXX''' and '''TRENDnet812acXXXX''' :('''XXXX''' being a 4 digit number pre-set per router)
==Images== <gallery caption="from TRENDnet"> Image:TEW-812DRU.jpg|angled Image:TEW-812DRU_front.jpg|front Image:TEW-812DRU_back.jpg|back Image:box_TEW-812DRU.jpg|box </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::packaging| ]]
